settings.text: WE’RE OBSESSED WITH EVERY DETAIL OF DOGS

settings.headline: Hi, I'm Kyndall,
settings.content:
Dog mom to 5 pups, Decker, Ramsey, Piper, Wagyu, and KC, wife to my high school sweetheart, Jake, real mom to Levee and River, and co-founder of Pupsentials. 

What started as a passion project in our home in Austin has grown into a small business that’s touched thousands of pet parents across the country.

Because to us—and to you—they’re not just pups. They’re family.

We’re grateful every day to build our dream one stitch at a time and to help fellow pup parents celebrate the unconditional love that inspired it all.

With love from our family to yours,
Kyn

settings.headline: EVERY PURCHASE GIVES BACK TO PUPS
settings.content:
At Pupsentials, giving back is woven into everything we do. That’s why with every purchase, a portion of proceeds goes directly to Saving Hope, a local rescue organization based in North Dallas.

Together, we’re not just creating beautiful, one-of-a-kind artwork—we’re helping do a little more good in the world, one pup at a time.

settings.headline: Every Purchase Gives Back
settings.content:
Describe your mission, values, or what makes your brand special.

Explain how customers contribute to your cause or community.

settings.description: Kyndall and Jake meet and become high school sweethearts.
Jake and Kyn get their first dog, Decker. It’s love at first sight.
They’re obsessed. Next came the rescue pup, Ramsey, and Piper, the bulldog.
Kyn and Jake tie the knot. Of course, all 3 dogs are there as witnesses.
What’s one more dog? Wagyu, another bulldog, joins the pack.
Kyndall and Jake welcome a baby boy, Levee!

Jake wanted to surprise Kyn with a special, custom gift to honor her love of dogs. When he couldn’t find anything that felt personal, stylish, or detailed enough, he decided to buy an embroidery machine and do it himself.
Kyn loved it so much, they thought about starting a business. Voila, Pupsentials is born in Austin, Texas.
First sweatshirt is sold! We have a business!
Pup parents are obsessed! Kyn and Jake buy 10 embroidery machines in their garage to keep up.
Celebs like Hannah Brown, Justin Bieber, Kris Jenner, and Kyle Richards are obsessed. And share!
Celebs like Hannah Brown, Justin Bieber, Kris Jenner, and Kyle Richards are obsessed. And share!
KC, a pointer mix, joins the crew, making the dog count up to 5.
Wagyu is featured in Goop!!!!! Can you even?!
Pupsentials is listed in Oprah’s. Favorite. Things. OOOOOPRAH.
KC, a pointer mix, joins the crew, making the dog count up to 5.
We grew our team to 22 artists and 12 embroidery specialists
We listened to our customers and improved. We purchased 15 more machines, improved our sweatshirt quality, moved to in-stitch, 25,000 stitches per artwork, and 15 different thread colors.
We welcomed a baby girl! Hello, River. We’re now a family of 4 (...er, 9).
20,000+ happy customers and counting. Our tails are wagging.

settings.testimonial_1_text: Just perfect, I could not be happier. The accuracy of the graphic was outstanding, and the quality of the sweatshirt was great.
settings.testimonial_2_text: Flawless customer service, unmatched detail, and human-made artistry. We will only order from Pupsentials from now on.
settings.testimonial_3_text: They’ve successfully captured Buster’s sweet little face. Even the pale pinks! I am so very impressed.
settings.testimonial_4_text: I got one for myself, my sister, and my sister-in-law! Cozy, oversized fit. We’re obsessed!
settings.testimonial_5_text: I love my Pupsentials sweatshirts!! I ordered 3 separately for each one of dogs because the quality is that amazing!

settings.title: Choose a Blank
settings.description: Select from our premium collection of sweatshirts, hats, bags, and jackets. Every item is stylish, well-made, and built to last.

settings.title: Upload a Pup Photo
settings.description: Upload a clear, front-facing photo that captures your dog’s unique spirit. Our artists will transform it into a one-of-a-kind design.

settings.title: Wear Their Love
settings.description: Once your custom piece is ready, wear it proudly and keep your pup close to your heart every day.
